WSUS31 KKCI 130355 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 4E 
VALID UNTIL 0555Z 
VA NC SC GA TN KY AL 
FROM 50NNE HMV-50NE MCN-20NNW CEW-20SW BNA-50NNE HMV 
AREA SEV EMBD TS MOV FROM 23060KT. TOPS ABV FL450. 
TORNADOES...HAIL TO 3 IN...WIND GUSTS TO 60KT POSS. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 130555-130955 
FROM 40SE DXO-CSN-60SW ECG-30NW PIE-180S CEW-50NE PXV-40SE DXO 
REF WW 109 110 112 113 115. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
